page.title: 18ROAD ACCIDENTS IN BELLE ISLE
page.content: We did a survey to find out about the sorts of people who were likely to have accidents on the roads. {AGE OF PEOPLE INVOLVED IN ACCIDENTS _____________________________________ _0-56-16 17-30 31-45 46-60 61-75 75+ { 5 16 40 14 7 10 1 {WHAT PERSON WAS DOING AT THE TIME ___________________________________ Pedestrian Passenger Driver Rider {33 19 23 18} {THE KINDS OF VEHICLE INVOLVED } _______________________________ Car Taxi Bus Lorries Bicycle {78 4 2 11 7} Motorcycles { 12} These figures refer to road accidents in Belle Isle in the year 1984. {
